name: ANTSIntegrateVectorField
author: ANTs Developers
description: This tool integrates a vector field, where vectors are voxels, using a region of interest (ROI) mask. The ROI mask controls where the integration is performed and specifies the starting point region.

inputs.name: Vector Field Input
inputs.description: Input vector field image (e.g., VecImageIN.nii.gz), where vectors are voxels.

inputs.name: ROI Mask Input
inputs.description: Input ROI mask image (e.g., ROIMaskIN.nii.gz), an integer image controlling where the integration is performed.

inputs.name: Fibers Output
inputs.description: Output VTK text file for fibers (e.g., FibersOUT.vtk).

output-files.name: Fibers Output
output-files.description: The output is the fibers as a VTK text file.

output-files.name: Length Image Output
output-files.description: The output is the length image.
